revised_title: Description of a Monstrous Child Born in Heisagger, South Jutland
tldr: A child born in Heisagger, South Jutland, in 1684, had a monstrous appearance with an old-looking face, extra limbs, and joints resembling knots. The mother had two other children who were normally developed. The child died shortly after birth. This report provides a detailed description of the child's physical features.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Development and Genetics
